name: Princess Tale
description:
Way too cutesy !!
Enjoy beautiful illustrations and cutie characters!

▣ Game Featured ▣
Loverly and Cute Princess illustration
Save the world from the Demon Queen with your lovely princesses!


□ Blow away all the boringness Idel Game!
Different Support system for all New Player!
Daily Gem Reward (2700) will be given for 7 days!


□ Vivid and Emotional Character!
SD character showing various expressions during the battle
Experience many expressions!


□ Fun is a Game! The game is fun!
No more Stress! - Auto battle and reward!
We will make you the main character in Fantasy of Princess Tale!



□ Simple Character Growth!
Take care of your Princess with Level Link System whenever it needs!

□ Make your strategical tactic and combination!
Simple control with strategy! Not a boring repetition!

Take the victory with an attribute, skill, and arrangement in the advanced dungeon.

□ You will save this world!
Please help a princess and save the World, Misugarudo!
